text:
@realDonaldTrump Or you could give some attention to more pressing matters like Covid-19 and Black Human Rights! No rush, take your time, no need to hurry... I mean, it's not like these are life of death issues are they? Oh wait... OH YES THEY EFFING ARE you disgusting Bawbag! 
#ShufflesTheClown
